mapper.sql: id, request_type, key_word, title, content, mobile, email, phone, website, public_platform, wechat,linkedin, language_type, language_id, status,language_level , user_type,user_id,view_count,create_time,update_time,facebook,whatsapp, others,qrcode

sql.trim:
user_type = #{query.userType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler} and
request_type = #{query.requestType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler} and
user_id = #{query.userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and
(title like concat("%",#{query.key},"%") or key_word like concat("%",#{query.key},"%")) and
status = 1

mapper.insert: insert into product_request (id, request_type, key_word, title, content, mobile, email, phone, website, public_platform, wechat, linkedin, language_type, language_id, status, language_level, user_type,user_id, view_count, create_time, update_time, facebook,whatsapp,others,qrcode) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requestType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, #{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkedIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{languageType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, #{languageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, #{languageLevel,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.model.typeHandler.LanguageLevelHandel}, #{userType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler},#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{viewCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{facebook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{whatsapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update product_request
request_type = #{requestType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler},
key_word = #{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
linkedin = #{linkedIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
public_platform = #{publicPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language_type = #{languageType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler},
language_id = #{languageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`status` = #{status,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler},
user_type = #{userType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
view_count = #{viewCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
facebook = #{facebook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whatsapp = #{whatsapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
others = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update product_request set request_type = #{requestType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, key_word = #{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, public_platform = #{publicPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkedin = #{linkedIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language_type = #{languageType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, language_id = #{languageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, language_level = #{languageLevel,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.model.typeHandler.LanguageLevelHandel}, user_type = #{userType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, view_count = #{viewCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, facebook = #{facebook,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, whatsapp = #{whatsapp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, others = #{others,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
